item.title: Northdown Beach Video
item.description: I installed the latest firmware udpate to my Sony a7iii (with much difficulty) to get the new intervalometer feature. Using it to try out a new video format idea I have had. Put simply, a series of timelapse sequences - all from the same scene. But the timelapses are short interval, around 1 second, longer than your average burst mode yet short enough to cover 10-20 seconds of action. Combining the nostalgic quality of photos and the immersing effect of video.
